modules.description: This module constructs download URLs for various object types stored in a Software Heritage archive instance. It supports content, directory, revision, release, and snapshot objects by converting their identifiers into downloadable URLs, handling both direct hash inputs and structured object representations. Use cases include retrieving source code files, directories, or version history from Software Heritage using SWHIDs.

This module computes SWHIDs for content, directory, release, revision, and snapshot objects based on their specific attributes. It handles raw content strings, directory structures via deep traversal, and structured metadata like hashes, dates, authors, and branch configurations. Concrete use cases include generating persistent identifiers for software artifacts in a version control system or archive.

This module generates persistent identifiers (SWHIDs) for software artifacts and constructs downloadable URLs for accessing stored objects. It supports content, directories, revisions, releases, and snapshots, allowing operations such as computing SWHIDs from raw data or metadata and converting identifiers into archive URLs. For example, it can generate a SWHID for a source code file or build a download link for a specific version of a software repository.
